dct_description_sm: Title cartouche at the top right.
Includes illustration of sailing ships, fish and other animals.
There are colored cartouches: Neptune with trident and six tall ships in the Atlantic Ocean (called "Mare Atlanticum" in the north hemisphere and "Oceanus Aethiopicus" in the southern hemisphere).
There are colored cartouches: one sea monster and one tall ship in the Indian Ocean (called Oceanus Orientalis).
